::Autofire::

Autofire nods, looking at the reports and pushing a button. Another 
screen came alive, this one showing a visual of the base. Autofire 
presses a finger on the screen where it showed a shuttle being 
unloaded by two bots, and the camera zooms in, centering on that 
spot. Their Decepticon symbols stood out plainly.

"We're gonna be right over them soon. Do you want to try to contact 
them?" Autofire asks, knowing that the Decepticon symbols would mean 
they might be friendlier to Megatron than other bots. On the other 
hand, it might mean that they might want to kill him more.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The computer screen comes allive, the radar showing the ships energy
> signature, and about six energy signatures inside. Just outside of 
it are
> four energy signatures, and about two miles away are another nine.
> "Hmmmmm," Megatron murmurs contemplaiting, "They are well spread 
out," He
> says to Autofire, "Can we zoom in with any kind of camera?"
